official_title: The Effect of a CPR Decision Aid on CPR Knowledge and Code-Status Preferences in Patients With Advanced Gynecologic Malignancies
inclusion_criteria:
* patients with stage III or greater cervical, ovarian, or uterine malignancies
* receiving chemotherapy at UAB gynecologic oncology infusion center
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 99 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* early stage gynecologic cancer
* receiving chemotherapy at a different location
* Non-English speaking
* deafness
* blindness
